reviewText:
Introduce students to a wide variety of physical science concepts - or use these 12 short segments to complement your current curriculum. This DVD covers an array of important topics: light and heat, friction, calculating average speed, the eye, heat, electricity, magnetism, chemical properties of mixtures, polymers, energy transfer, and more! Includes a video index, correlated national standards, teacher resources, and six segments of professional development for teachers. - Pitsco

Media: DVD
